body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]
We have a new QueueAckLevel field in shard info which is generalized for all task queues, we should deprecate/stop using other ack level fields that are specific to one queue type (e.g. timer, transfer, visibility, etc.)

The migration of those ack level fields will happen in next (1.16?) release, and we can stop using those old fields in next+1 (1.17?) release.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/2511#discussion_r812529951
title: Deprecate old ack level related fields in shard info
